html.span: My Demo Site - Main Portal Screen

span.style: font-size: small; font-style: bold; color: red;

html.span: Note: This is a test site. For demonstration purposes only!

Welcome to the {domain} main portal page!
To display user specific sites, click on one of these links:
www.{domain} - Main web page
It is easy to integrate your current web site with the tourgeek.com system.
home.{domain} - Employee portal
All of your business functions are on-line.
vendor.{domain} - Vendor portal
Give your suppliers the information they need to serve your customers.
system specifications - Help and System specifications.
You can also click on the help button for screen specific help.
To start the tourgeek.com applications, click on one of these test accounts:
- Use the same password you entered for your account.
- There will be a short delay the first time you use these programs as the code is downloaded.
